entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 58 %

Dewpoint: -38.9°C
